system.description: This kit contains an adjustable conductive heat applicator and many segments of material, each impregnated with strong, heat activated adhesives and attached to a long adjustable handle. This kit allows a character to repressurize a compromised spacesuit or MOPP suit. It takes one minute to repair a depressurized or compromised suit. Because the repair is fragile and intended for emergencies, it canâ€™t withstand any sort of wear. If the character wearing the repaired suit takes any amount of damage, the suit is again depressurized and compromised.
